name: Big Mouth (Ledermanzz)
description:
Arie the dentist faces a new unexpected costumer- 

Leo the lion.
Leo needs a tooth extraction- a 30 seconds long procedure.
Leo can't keep his mouth open for long.
Damn Leo, you wild son of a cat.

Test your cat-like instincts and try to make it to the end.

DON'T LOSE YOUR HEAD.

controller- long mouse click / release.
